text: Heinig is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Katrin Dörre-Heinig (born 1961), former athlete from Germany, who competed mainly in the marathon *Kurt Heinig (born 1886), German lithograph, politician and journalist *Marcel Heinig (born 1981), German extreme sportsman who has his greatest success in decatriathlons *Stefan Heinig (born 1962), CEO of the major German company KiK Textilien und Non-Food GmbH from Bönen (Germany) Category:German-language surnames
title: Heinig
